quotes.quote: My big brother still thinks he's a better singer than me.
One can be a brother only in something. Where there is no tie that binds men, men are not united but merely lined up.
Brothers don't necessarily have to say anything to each other, they can sit in a room and be together and just be completely comfortable with each other.
We came into the world like brother and brother; And now let's go hand in hand, not one before another.
We came into the world like brother and brother; And now let's go hand in hand, not one before another.
Half the time when brothers wrestle, it's just an excuse to hug each other.
When brothers agree, no fortress is so strong as their common life.
The younger brother must help to pay for the pleasures of the elder.
It takes two men to make one brother.
Sometimes being a brother is even better than being a superhero.
You're a great brother. You give us a heart attack worrying about your heart attack, which you didn't even have the decency to have.
If thy brother wrongs thee, remember not so much his wrong doing, but more than ever that he is thy brother.
Brothers don't necessarily have to say anything to each other â€“ they can sit in a room and be together and just be completely comfortable with each other.
There's no buddy like a brother.
Brothers are like streetlights along the road, they don't make distance any shorter but they light up the path and make the walk worthwhile.
There is no love like the love for a brother. There is no love like the love from a brother.
After a girl is grown, her little brothers, now her protectors, seem like big brothers.
Either men will learn to live like brothers, or they will die like beasts.
There's no other love like the love for a brother. There's no other love like the love from a brother.
Because brothers don't let each other wander in the dark alone.
I had older brothers who would pick on me, and injustice always boiled my blood.
Funny how older brothers could still be annoying even after everyone was all grown-up.
As we grew up, my brothers acted like they didn't care, but I always knew they looked out for me and were there!
A brother is a friend given by nature.
A brother is a friend given by nature.
Siblings are the people we practice on, the people who teach us about fairness and cooperation and kindness and caringquite often the hard way.
The thing with brothers is, you're supposed to take turns being the keeper. Sometimes you get to sit down and be the brother who is kept.
Nothing can stop me from loving my brother.
I had older brothers, and I don't think there's anything worse than an older brother. They pretty much told me the end of everything they got to see before I did.
A sympathetic friend can be quite as dear as a brother.
